about_the_game:
Fantastic Frolic is an RPG with survival elements set in the whimsical world of Quirkyland. Players take on the roles of one of three main characters - Lil' J, Esther, and Gorf - as they embark on a quest to save the world from Mount Akma's prophesied volcanic explosion.



The game combines classic RPG mechanics like combat, character progression, and exploration with survival elements such as resource management and crafting. Players must gather evidence to prove the volcanic explosion prophecy is real while battling monsters and overcoming challenges in a quirky land that doesn't believe the prophecy could be true.



Key Features
- Play as beloved Adventure Time inspired characters Lil' J, and Gorf
- Dynamic RPG combat against outlandish monsters
- Survival mechanics like resource gathering and item crafting
- Uncover clues to prove the impending volcanic explosion and save the world
- Stylized visuals and music that capture the game's unique charm



Quirkyland
Ancient prophecies say that Mount Akma was the entity responsible for the creation of all of Quirkyland. Priests from ancient tribes tell the story of Akma's fury and kindness when, after millennia in his eternal sleep, he announced his awakening with the blossoming of a beautiful cherry tree on its summit, thus the Prophecy of the Ashen Tree was born. Some say that the birth of the cherry tree represents the kindness of Akma, who warned the gods of its imminent eruption. Others believe that Akma defied the gods, causing destruction and death in his path, in a rage that lasted hundreds of years.



Whether out of kindness or fury, the fact is that Akma, after his awakening, drove away the gods and gave rise to Quirkyland, the rocks, the earth, the rivers, and all the life that lives in it today. The desperate gods even tried to contain Akma's momentum, each one was responsible for manufacturing a small artifact, which should contain the powers of each God to calm the primordial volcano. Thus, Brumal, the goddess of Winter, created the Heart of Eternal Ice. Aureon, the god of Autumn, created the Scepter of Serenity. Flora, the goddess of Spring, created the Orb of Tranquility. However, Helion, the god of Summer, enchanted by the heat of the volcanic flames, did not fulfill his promise, breaking the pact between the gods, and allowing Akma to awaken.

Today, Akma's silhouette reigns supreme, and can be seen from all corners of this world, imposing, and once again asleep. This sleep is as long as your firstborn eruption.



Thanks to Akma, today Quirkyland is a prosperous land. Its soil, rich in nutrients, provided by its progenitor, allows the planting of the most diverse crops. Be it the abundant grape vines on the outskirts of Brightopolis, the abundant fungi in the Swirl Swamp, or the wheat, cultivated for years by goblins on the Peculiar Plateau, the fact is that everything that is planted grows in Quirkyland.

These days, the cherry tree has blossomed again, announcing Akma's imminent reawakening. But time passed, and today Brightopolis looks to other horizons. Its population does not think about gods, fury, kindness and magical artifacts, and does not even believe that a volcano can erupt, even the slightest mention of the idea is a complete delusion for many.

Lady Iris, the ruler of Brightopolis and princess of all Quirkyland, is one of the few people who still believes in the Ashen Tree Prophecy and the scientific evidence that proves that it once occurred. Knowledgeable about all the beings in her prosperous kingdom, she encountered a trio of good-hearted adventurers, and revealed to them, through a dream, the real meaning of the cherry blossom. Summoning them to his court, he imbued them with the task of taking knowledge throughout Quirkyland, and even more importantly, finding these lost artifacts and taking them to the summit of Akma, offering peace and serenity to the primordial entity, to thus guarantee the survival of the beings of Quirkyland.

short_description: Embark on a whimsical quest to save Quirkyland in Fantastic Frolic. Play as Lil' J, Esther or Gorf and use your unique abilities to defeat monsters and uncover the truth behind the volcanic explosion prophecy. Explore a vibrant world, gather resources, and level up in this delightful adventure.
